ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Provides 'R6' abstract classes for building machine learning models  with 'scikit-learn' like API. <http://scikit-learn.org/> is a popular module  for 'Python' programming language which design became de facto a standard  in industry for machine learning tasks.

Provides 'R6' abstract classes for building machine learning models  with 'scikit-learn' like API. <http://scikit-learn.org/> is a popular module  for 'Python' programming language which design became de facto a standard  in industry for machine learning tasks.

name: r-mlapi
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.1.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-mlapi
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/mlapi_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/mlapi/mlapi_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: d9ce7932a2c07fa07689f8a120afad77293544fb227ad22e8909add44d8cd1e3

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-matrix >=1.1
    - r-r6 >=2.2.1
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-matrix >=1.1
    - r-r6 >=2.2.1

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('mlapi')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('mlapi')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=mlapi
  license: MIT
  summary: Provides 'R6' abstract classes for building machine learning models  with 'scikit-learn' like API. <http://scikit-learn.org/> is a popular module  for 'Python' programming language which design became de facto a standard  in industry for machine learning tasks.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - CurtLH
